items.value: %113% has reported that the farmers will soon be able to harvest their crops. A sizable amount of the harvest will be given to their troops, providing them with needed Supplies.

%113% let the farmers harvest the crops. While they were busy storing the harvested produce, he ravaged the farmlands with a blighting spell. As the farmers slept, he proceeded to burn the produce. When they awaken the next day, they will realize that they've not only lost the harvest, their farm has also been blighted.
%113% entered the farm at night and was about to poison the crops when a farmer named %00@ discovered him. He managed to slay the farmer before being forced to flee.
%113% let the farmers harvest the crops. He waited until the farmers slept before stealing the harvest, providing us with much needed Supply.
%113% was discovered by some farmers! He managed to run away unscathed but %01@ is now aware of our sabotage attempts and have declared war upon us.
The farm produced extra supplies for the city.
%113% was caught by some guards and was slain in combat. What a weakling. He deserved that.
The farm produced extra supplies for the city.
